articles.title: How to make sure your white sneakers stay white
articles.author: Washington Post
articles.summary: There are loads of good ways to clean sneakers, and no single method or product is better than any of the others. Tossing them in the washing machine is the most effective way to clean white sneakers. Sneaker-cleaning kits include a gentle cleaning agent, a shoe brush and a soft cloth. Eraser sponges work well to remove dirt and scuff marks from sneakers, especially the rubber midsole. White gum erasers can be used to safely remove scuffs and dirt from suede sneakers.

articles.author: Lightspeed Commerce Inc
articles.summary: Lightspeed's Website Builder lets retailers create custom web elements without coding. It uses AI to analyze screen captures and generate production-ready code. It's currently available in beta version with select Lightspeed merchants, with broader availability later this year. Lightspeed powers the world's best brands and retailers including Birkenstock (Australia), Neal's Yard (London) and Treadz (Colorado).

articles.title: 404 Not Found
articles.summary: nginx.com.nginx is a news website. It's run by Nigginx's founder, Niggurl.com Nigglinginx. Nigglincin is based in Nigeria. nginx's website is called Niggliin.

articles.title: Elizabeth Arden cream that 'makes a difference' reduced by 70% to £12
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Elizabeth Arden Visible Difference Refining Moisture Cream Complex is now £11.85 on Amazon. The moisturiser has five stars at Elizabeth Arden, 4.55 stars at LookFantastic and 4.5 stars at Boots. It's a rich formula with plant-based squalane that aims to restore smoothness and radiance to ageing skin.

articles.title: I'm the first journalist to try the new self-cooling drinks can – but does it really work?
articles.author: Alex Pell
articles.summary: The 500ml unit is a demo model with glued-on decals. It has a snowflake-shaped button that changes colour once activated. The powder will be finer when it goes into production. It's quieter than a regular 500ml can, but you can hear the salt crystals as you move it.

articles.title: LG Electronics' AI Washtower optimizes laundry in 3 seconds
articles.author: 쉘든의 밀리터리
articles.summary: LG Electronics Inc. launched its AI WashTower, a washer-dryer with enhanced washing and drying performance. Pre-orders begin next week and the retail price is 4.89 million won ($3,368). Subscription option is available at 93,900 won per month for a six-year contract.

articles.title: Nvidia expands AI computing portfolio with DGX Spark and DGX Station
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Nvidia has announced DGX Spark and DGX Station as new AI personal supercomputers powered by the company's Grace Blackwell chip platform. The new machines will allow users to prototype, fine-tune, and run AI models in a range of sizes at the edge.

articles.title: Bissell vacuums and mops are up to 33% off just in time for spring cleaning
articles.author: Trisha Easto
articles.summary: Up to 33% off Bissell vacuums and mops are on sale at Amazon's Big Spring Sale this month. New members can try one week of Amazon Prime benefits for just $1.99. After that, Prime costs $14.99 per month or $139 per year.

articles.title: Enjoy Better Sleep with Kurlon's Premium Single Bed Mattresses
articles.author: Post News Network
articles.summary: Kurlon has developed a line of premium single bed mattresses with specific features to ensure maximum comfort and support. The mattresses are made with high-quality materials and advanced manufacturing techniques. The materials used in the construction of the mattress are resistant to dust mites, bacteria, and allergens.

articles.title: What is Looka? Everything we know about the AI logo and brand building tool
articles.author: Max Slater-Robins
articles.summary: Looka is an AI-powered logo design tool that specialises in logo creation and branding. It's aimed at entrepreneurs, small businesses, and freelancers who need quick, affordable branding without hiring a professional designer. Looka is not a full graphic design tool, so users cannot create complex visuals or edit images beyond logo and branding assets. It does not support print services.

articles.title: Guinness Smooth unveils bold new influencer lineup ahead of exciting ‘Make It Yours' campaign launch

The launch will take place at Next Media Park in Kampala.

articles.title: White Stuff's re-launches cosy sweatshirt shoppers ‘demanded back in stock'

It's available in sizes XS to XXL, but if you prefer a slimmer, more fitted silhouette, the brand recommends sizing down from usual size.

articles.title: People are just finding out what the three compartments in washing machine are for
articles.author: Ariane Sohrabi-Shiraz
articles.summary: The TikTok user named Elle explains the purpose of each compartment in the detergent drawer. The first compartment is intended for washing powder, the second for fabric softener and the third for pre-wash treatments. The compartments may vary depending on the washing machine model.

articles.title: Russian Tech Giant Yango Targets Brazilian Market with Major Investment Plans
articles.author: Iolanda Fonseca
articles.summary: Yango, a Russian tech giant, is planning to invest up to US$400 million in Brazil. The company already has a presence in Brazil through virtual games and digital advertising services. Yango operates in more than 30 countries across multiple continents and employs nearly 100,000 people worldwide.

articles.title: Tech for Babies Is Booming. Here's What One Parent Found Helped the Most.

He found the most useful baby tech to be smartphone apps that helped them process information in their sleep-deprived state.

articles.title: Canada has a ‘Trump sandwich,' and our president probably won't like it

articles.title: Taboola Reaches 10 Years in Serving Advertising on Microsoft Properties Including MSN, Edge Browsers and Windows Experiences

articles.title: Major EV car brand unveils groundbreaking new technology that charges car for 300 miles in ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD has revealed the new charging system which could revolutionise the landscape. It charges a car for 300 miles in just five minutes and could be ready for production within a few years. It is the first of its kind in the world.

articles.title: ‘Does that mean we lose Persil too?': Expert says you should stock up on Costco's ...

articles.summary: TikToker Zach Pozniak recommends Kirkland detergent to TikToker Jeevesny. Kirkland is a great detergent because it cleans really well and it's well priced, according to Poznieksnkiak.

articles.title: Canada has a ‘Trump sandwich,' and our president probably won't like it
articles.author: Penn Live
articles.summary: A new sandwich with baloney, Russian dressing and a small pickle is all the rage in Canada these days. President Donald Trump probably won't be a fan of this one because he taunts Canada with the whole 51st state thing and as he taunted Canada recently.

articles.summary: New York's startup ecosystem is at a crossroads with the upcoming expiration of START-UP. The program is not being renewed.   It is not a good idea to renew it at this time.  It's a bad idea for the future of the startup ecosystem.

articles.title: Nvidia RTX Pro 6000 Blackwell sets a new standard for workstation GPUs
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Nvidia has introduced the RTX Pro 6000. It is a new version of the previous generation's RTX Pro 5000. It's more powerful than the previous version. It has a higher resolution screen resolution and is faster than previous versions. It also has better quality graphics card.

articles.title: Kerala needs to focus on iconic tourism destinations: Union Minister
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Gajendra Singh Shekhawat believes that the state has been in the forefront of introducing novel products to attract tourists and it should continue to do so, he says. He is also optimistic about the future of tourism in the state, which has been successful recently.

articles.title: Reveal Launches Brand Lift Measurement Product Across Nine European Countries
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The Leading Out-of-Home Measurement Platform Continues Global Expansion. Reveal is pleased to announce the launch of its market leading Brand Lift Measurement product in nine key European markets. It is already a proven success in the U.S. and Canada.

articles.title: ZouZou Coffee Launches Groundbreaking Turkish Coffee Machine on Kickstarter
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: ZouZou Coffee Pty Ltd has launched a new automatic Turkish coffee machine. It can make from 1 to 10 cups of coffee in 3 to 6 minutes and preserves the coffee's taste.      Â  .   in 3-6 minutes.

articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: ASUS AI POD made its debut at GTC 2025. It features the NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 platform with significant order placements secured. There was also an AI solutions showcase with models powered by NVIDIA Blackwell, NVIDIA HGX and NVIDIA MGX.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 9a is here and Apple can't beat its cheaper price tag
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Google has added a budget-friendly version of the Pixel 9 and 9 Pro to its Pixel line-up. It beats the latest Apple iPhone 16e prices. It is available in black and white and costs $99.99 for both the 9 and the 9 Pro.

articles.title: Amdocs Expands Generative AI Suite, amAIz, with New Network Agents
articles.author: Corsicana Daily Sun
articles.summary: Newly launched agentic offering leverages NVIDIA AI Enterprise and AWS to support accelerated network design, planning and deployment, network troublesharing and healing. It's based on NVIDIA AI. Enterprise and Amazon Web Services (AWS). It's available on Google Play Store and on Amazon.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus review: ‘Ultra' experience without the hefty price tag
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus is a device with a refined design, solid performance and a vibrant large screen. It is positioned between the Ultra model and the more affordable variants. It has a sleek design and a solid performance. It's available in black and white.

articles.title: Google Slashes Pixel 9 Pro And Pro XL Prices In Major New Deals
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Google is offering a big price cut on Google Pixel 9 Pro and Pro XL. It's a good offer for those who want to buy a Pixel 9 or Pro XL, but don't want to pay a lot of money for it. It starts at $99.

articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Pure is looking to leverage its presence in enterprise storage to win more business in the nascent but growing market for AI storage. Pure's new offering is called AI-aware storage (AI-SAS).       i.e. it's a form of artificial intelligence.

articles.author: Fox News
articles.summary: Netflix's new show is called "The Crown" and is available on Netflix.com and on Netflix's app "Netflix".com. It's available on iTunes and on Amazon.com as well. It costs $4.99 per episode. It is available in English and Spanish.
